mapper.select: select distinct CARID as key, CARID as value from INCOMESTATEMENT
select distinct CARTYPE as key, CARTYPE as value from INCOMESTATEMENT
select distinct COLUMNNAME as key, COLUMNNAME as value from INCOMESTATEMENT
select cartype, listagg(distinct CARID, ',') within group ( order by CARID) tmp from INCOMESTATEMENT group by CARTYPE

select cartype, carid, columnname from INCOMESTATEMENT where ONEMONTH < 0 or TWOMONTH < 0 or THREEMONTH < 0 or FOURMONTH < 0 or FIVEMONTH < 0 or SIXMONTH < 0 or SEVENMONTH < 0 or EIGHTMONTH < 0 or NINEMONTH < 0 or TENMONTH < 0 or ELEVENTMONTH < 0 or TWELVEMONTH < 0

select cartype, carid, columnname columnname, carid, (threemonth + fourmonth + fivemonth + sixmonth + sevenmonth + eightmonth + ninemonth + tenmonth + eleventmonth + twelvemonth + onemonth + twomonth) / 10000 as subjectcode FROM ( select max(CARTYPE) cartype, columnname, listagg(CARID, ',') within group ( order by CARID desc) carid, sum(THREEMONTH) threemonth, sum(FOURMONTH) fourmonth, sum(FIVEMONTH) fivemonth, sum(SIXMONTH) sixmonth, sum(SEVENMONTH) sevenmonth, sum(EIGHTMONTH) eightmonth, sum(NINEMONTH) ninemonth, sum(TENMONTH) tenmonth, sum(ELEVENTMONTH) eleventmonth, sum(TWELVEMONTH) twelvemonth, sum(ONEMONTH) onemonth, sum(TWOMONTH) twomonth from INCOMESTATEMENT I where I.CARTYPE = #{cartype} and year = #{year} group by COLUMNNAME)
